meanings.definition: A photographic process using sensitized gelatin plates exposed to sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The heliotype captured the beauty of the flower in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a heliotype of a stunning sunset at the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to take a selfie with the heliotype.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a heliotype, bright and unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The heliotype image of the mountain was so clear, it felt like I could touch it.

meanings.definition: A photograph produced by the heliotype process.
meanings.sent1: The book had a heliotype of an ancient map on its cover.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed a heliotype of her family on the mantelpiece.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, creating a heliotype of chaos on the floor.
meanings.sent4: His memory of her was like a heliotype, forever etched in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The heliotype in the magazine was so detailed, it looked almost real.
